help_step.text:
GENERAL INFO

  • Create Leads/Site/Bldg campaigns with predesigned steps.
  • Each Campaign needs to have different steps designated for a time period.
  • Each step will send emails (Form template) to predefined set of leads, potential Site/Bldg or Site/Bldg.
  • Design targeted emails for each step (time frame)

HOW TO CREATE A CAMPAIGN

  • Your first task is to create a add a new Campaign.
  • Then add step (schedule time frames) for that Campaign.
  • Spread the steps on daily, weekly, or monthly basis.
  • Attach a pre-created email template to each step and let the system monitor leads, potential Site/Bldg or Site/Bldgs.
  • Check the campaign log to review what was sent and when was it sent.
